options.description: [2mInput SAM file of alignments (if this file doesn't[0m [2mexist, the alignment will be performed with results[0m [2msaved to this file - you can use the aligner[0m [2marguments with this script)[0m
[2mFASTA file containing one or more reference[0m [2msequences[0m
[2mMinimum alignment length (bp) - exclude alignments[0m [2mshorter than this length (default: 100)[0m
[2mThreshold for high error rates, expressed as the[0m [2mfraction between the mean error rate and the random[0m [2malignment error rate (default: 0.3)[0m
[2mPath and/or prefix for table files summarising[0m [2mreference errors for reference windows (default: do[0m [2mnot save window tables)[0m
[2mPath and/or prefix for table files summarising[0m [2mreference errors at each base (default: do not save[0m [2mbase tables)[0m
[2mPath for HTML report (default: do not save HTML[0m [2mreport)[0m
[2mNumber of CPU threads used to align (default: the[0m [2mnumber of available CPUs)[0m
